title: Hegemonikón Automation Backbone (n8n & Zapier)
summary: Documentation for Hegemonikón's automation infrastructure, using n8n and Zapier to create a 'life center' (人生の中枢) backbone. Covers the strategic decision to adopt high-capability automation despite complexity, transitioning from cron/shell to a Dockerized n8n environment on Debian. Includes designs for Perplexity daily digestion, morning boot notifications, and the 'Desire List' for autonomous AI evolution.
